root.name: Goblins Quest 3
root.description: OverviewThe princess of the kingdom is kidnapped by soldiers and without thinking he rescues her. A king, in search for the key of the maze, finds out that Blount has rescued the princess and realizes that she is the keeper of The Maze. The king imprisons Blount because he helped the princess escape and he is bitten by a werewolf in his cell. Blount has to find the princess and "The Key of The Maze" before the king does.In his quest for the princess he meets various characters who help him find the girl.

similar_games.game: The Bizarre Adventures of Woodruff and the Schnibble
